name: Spiral Knights
description: The native Linux client + OpenJDK 8 (32 bit) + Steam integration patch.
content:
exe: spiral.sh
files:
- game: https://gamemedia.spiralknights.com/spiral/client/spiral-install.bin
- openjdk: https://download.java.net/openjdk/jdk8u41/ri/openjdk_jre_ri-8u41-b04-linux-i586-14_jan_2020.tar.gz
- patch: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ZtfB3uV44slADVl8hFisBC1SfirBTi2L/view?usp=sharing
installer:
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: game
- extract:
    file: openjdk
- extract:
    file: patch
- execute:
    args: null
